data.text: @The_5th_Turtle @jcmfanclub He's a huge Michael Bolton fan.

So many memorable quotes from “sounds like someone had a case of the Mondays.” to “That would be great.” Iconic scenes like them destroying the printer in the field. Overall Office Space still remains of the best ultimate workplace comedies. Damn funny entertaining movie. (2/2) https://t.co/6NDkPt4CmS

Office Space is an well directed, hysterical comedy. Despite all its outdated technology & references, it still definitely holds up. Great cast, there’s not one wasted character. Anyone who’s ever worked in a cubicle farm or a meaningless office job has felt this before. (1/2)
Fuckin’ A https://t.co/axV70Q6v2B
Anyone who has never dreamed of watching their office burned down, hasn’t worked in a cubicle farm https://t.co/JQ7FyXvUs2
The lady next to Milton is a total bitch. She completely decides to not pass the cake. Regardless someone was gonna have no cake, but I’d rather it be her & not Milton. https://t.co/NcxVMVxKxJ
Man, 1999 was the year of giving your boss the finger. What was with 1999 & everyone wanting to rebel? https://t.co/fhr4haGY53
This guy went from a discount Neil Patrick Harris to a discount Sean William Scott in like one scene. https://t.co/SCwRpScvIm
How the hell did he punch a busted up printer without hurting or cutting his hand? This just looks like it would be incredibly painful https://t.co/amtnOa2gqp

Anyone who hasn’t had this thought, has never worked in a cubicle farm 

🎶Die motherfuckers die🎶 https://t.co/E12HIbO6MC
This guy is a discount Neil Patrick Harris. Also, I’m super awkward around girls & my O Face isn’t this embarrassing. https://t.co/4Oia3cvxRk
🎶Damn it feels good to be a gangster🎶 https://t.co/c3BhCcFFVR
Same here. Honestly 15 minutes sounds an exaggeration. https://t.co/OUQ5aiObfV
Again, me 90% of the time at work. https://t.co/XxWBtOyjKC
That’s me everyday. But replace the words “space out” with “rocks out to sweet tunes” & “hour” with all day. https://t.co/aKM20OYsn5
I work at a cubicle office & I’ve worked in several others in the past. It’s safe for me to say that every office has a Milton. https://t.co/cBhiAS6xCr
For anyone who hasn’t actually seen it, watch the Michael Bolton Valentine’s Day special on Netflix. It’s freaking hysterical. https://t.co/9thYUVfdph
The Bobs are absolutely hilarious characters. John C McGinley is brilliantly funny. https://t.co/V58CSUSC5V
This scene is funny, but it’s also dark as shit. Way to go movie for have a super casual death https://t.co/LY3Y92qiBz
Wow, Peter sucks at Tetris. https://t.co/MiLBtZlneO
I love how in 1999, this movie & The Matrix have scenes of their main character ducking cubicle walls to avoid getting caught?
If a waiter walked up & imitated me like this, I’d rip up their tip in front of them. https://t.co/HGcjpH9Biv
Yeah, Fuck her & fuck Mondays! https://t.co/hlF3OH1L5Y
Anytime I have to go back to work after a long weekend, I just think “what if the place burned down?” https://t.co/MqlVSLlSvJ
